availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Albert L. Tichenor (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. and miller)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer and miller. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Milton Tichenor in Nelson County on September 30, 1847. Father of William T. Tichenor. Married to Mary K. Duncan Tichenor in Nelson County on August 31, 1855. Married to Mollie Crawford Tichenor in Nelson County in May 1858. Father of Manny Tichenor, Charles Tichenor, Mattie Tichenor, Molly Tichenor, and Lora Tichenor. Miller in Spencer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Spencer County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Employed Jonah Tichenor as a farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nelson County in 1860.
